rukus.text: Niscaya ami tomara prati paryayakrame ala-kora'ana aratirna karaicho
Eteke tumi dhairyara saite tomara pratipalakara nirdesara pratiksa karaa arau sihamtara majara paraa kono papistha ba ghora akrtajna kaphirara anugatya nakaraiba
Arau puraa-gadhuli tomara pratipalakara nama smarana karaa
Arau raatira ekansata te'omra prati chajadaranata horaa arau raatira dirgha samaya te'omra paraitrata ghosana arau tachabiha patha karaa
Niscaya sihamta prthiraira jiranaka bhala paya arau sihamte sihamtara sanmukhara kathina dinatoka upeksa karae
Amiye'i sihamtaka srsti karaicho arau sihamtara gathana sudrrha karaicho. Arau ami yetiya iccha karaima tetiya'i sihamtara sthanata sihamtara darae (karaobaka) ani paraibartana karai dima
Niscaya e'ito eta upadesa; eteke yiye iccha karae si yena tara pratipalakara phale yoraara patha bachi laya
Arau allahe iccha nakaraile tomaloke iccha karaibalai saksama nahaâ€™ba; niscaya allaha mahajnani, prajnamaya
Te'om yaka iccha take'i nija rahamatara antarbhukta karae, arau yalimasakalara babe te'om prastuta karai raakhiche yantranadayaka sasti
